raw_text: PAUL – MARY RANJANI IVY – Beloved wife of late Bro. Paul Pandian,​ loving mother of Daisy,​ Thomas,​ Hepsy and Peter,​ fond mother-in-law of Dany,​ Gorden and Shanthini,​ grandmother of Angelo and Shalini,​ Angeline (Sis Nesam),​ Deborah,​ Rozanne,​ Karen and Hannah,​ great grandmother of Ashen and Jodash. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on 17th October from 8.00 a.m. onwards. Funeral Service will be held at the Parlour at 2.30 p.m. Cortege leaves Parlour therafter for burial at 4.00 p.m. at Christ Church,​ No.137,​ Mission Road,​ Kotte.066584

RODRIGO – DR WEDAGE DANTHA – (President’s Counsel,​ Former Principal of Sri Lanka Law College),​ beloved husband of Mrs P. Chandra Perera (Attorney-at-Law) and beloved father of Mr Wedage Oshada Rodrigo (Attorney-at-Law),​ beloved brother of Mrs Thilaka Ranasinghe,​ Mr Nimal Rodrigo,​ Mr Sarath Rodrigo and late Mr Gamini Rodrigo,​ passed away. Funeral ritual will be held at Madampitiya General Cemetery,​ Colombo on the 18th of October 2023 at 3.00 p.m. We will leave home at 2 p.m.066530
